fr.dogstellar.core

Class Stuff

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dogstellar.core.Stuff
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Armor, Potion, QuestElement, Weapon

    public abstract class Stuff
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class Stuff - A stuff is an object which can be in the player equipement. The stuff has a name, a description. The stuff can be carried by the player.
    Version:
    (01)
    Author:
    (G3)
